heading: ID
comment: The identifier given to the person, corresponding to that used in the collection files.

heading: URI (BnF)
comment: The URI given to the person within the Bibliothèque nationale de France database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (GND)
comment: The URI given to the person within the Deutschen Nationalbibliothek database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (ISNI)
comment: The URI given to the person within the International Standard Name Identifier database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (LC)
comment: The URI given to the person within the Library of Congress database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (Mirabile)
comment: The URI given to the person within the Mirabile database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (Oxford DNB)
xpath: //tei:person/string-join(.//tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[normalize-space(tei:title)="Oxford DNB" or normalize-space(tei:title)="DNB" or normalize-space(tei:title)="Oxford Dictionary of National Biography"]/@target, " ")
comment: The URI given to the person within the Oxford Dictionary of National Biography database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (Pinakes)
comment: The URI given to the person within the Pinakes database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (SUDOC)
comment: The URI given to the person within the Système Universitaire de Documentation database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (VIAF)
comment: The URI given to the person within the Virtual International Authority File database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (Wikidata)
comment: The URI given to the person within the Wikidata database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: other ref(s)
xpath: //tei:person/normalize-space(string-join(.//tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[not(.//tei:title[normalize-space(.)="BNF" or normalize-space(.)="GND" or normalize-space(.)="ISNI" or normalize-space(.)="LC" or normalize-space(.)="Mirabile" or normalize-space(.)="Oxford DNB" or normalize-space(.)="DNB" or normalize-space(.)="Oxford Dictionary of National Biography" or normalize-space(.)="Pinakes" or normalize-space(.)="SUDOC" or normalize-space(.)="VIAF" or normalize-space(.)="Wikidata"])]/tei:title/string-join(.,""), "; "))
comment: Other references given for the person, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element without a title element corresponding to the databases defined for the preceding columns.

heading: other URI(s)
xpath: //tei:person/string-join(.//tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[not(.//tei:title[normalize-space(.)="BNF" or normalize-space(.)="GND" or normalize-space(.)="ISNI" or normalize-space(.)="LC" or normalize-space(.)="Mirabile" or normalize-space(.)="Oxford DNB" or normalize-space(.)="DNB" or normalize-space(.)="Oxford Dictionary of National Biography" or normalize-space(.)="Pinakes" or normalize-space(.)="SUDOC" or normalize-space(.)="VIAF" or normalize-space(.)="Wikidata"])]/@target, " ")
comment: Other references given for the person, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element without a title element corresponding to the databases defined for the preceding columns.

heading: display
comment: The standard name assigned to the person.

heading: preferred
comment: The preferred name assigned to the person.

heading: variant
comment: Any variant name(s) assigned to the person.

heading: crossref
comment: Any crossreferencing name(s) assigned to the person.

heading: ms
comment: Any name(s) assigned to the person in manuscript contexts.

heading: birth
comment: Details of the date of birth of the person, as encoded within a birth element. This value may be straightforwardly formatted as a date, but may also be formatted as prose, including identification of an individual portion of a century, or an ante/post quem.

heading: when
comment: The date of birth of the person as encoded in a @when attribute to the birth element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: not before
comment: The terminus post quem for the date of birth of the person as encoded in a @notBefore attribute to the birth element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: not after
comment: The terminus ante quem for the date of birth of the person as encoded in a @notAfter attribute to the birth element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: certainty
comment: The certainty of the dating in the preceding columns, as encoded within the @cert attribute attribute. Possible values are high, medium, and low.

heading: calendar
comment: The calendar used for the dating in the preceding columns, as encoded within the @calendar attribute. The most common value is Gregorian.

heading: death
comment: Details of the date of death of the person, as encoded within a death element. This value may be straightforwardly formatted as a date, but may also be formatted as prose, including identification of an individual portion of a century, or an ante/post quem.

heading: when
comment: The date of death of the person as encoded in a @when attribute to the death element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: not before
comment: The terminus post quem for the date of death of the person as encoded in a @notBefore attribute to the death element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: not after
comment: The terminus ante quem for the date of death of the person as encoded in a @notAfter attribute to the death element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: certainty
comment: The certainty of the dating in the preceding columns, as encoded within the @cert attribute attribute. Possible values are high, medium, and low.

heading: calendar
comment: The calendar used for the dating in the preceding columns, as encoded within the @calendar attribute. The most common value is Gregorian.

heading: floruit
comment: Details of the active period of the person, as encoded within a floruit element. This value may be straightforwardly formatted as a date, but may also be formatted as prose, including identification of an individual portion of a century, or an ante/post quem.

heading: when
comment: The date of activity of the person as encoded in a @when attribute to the floruit element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: from
comment: The beginning of the active period of the person as encoded in a @from attribute to the floruit element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: to
comment: The end of the active period of the person as encoded in a @to attribute to the floruit element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: not before
comment: The terminus post quem for the date of death of the person as encoded in a @notBefore attribute to the death element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: not after
comment: The terminus ante quem for the active period of the person, as encoded in a @notAfter attribute to the death element, formatted as a date. The granularity of the value may vary, and in many cases will likely be no narrower than a year.

heading: certainty
comment: The certainty of the dating in the preceding columns, as encoded within the @cert attribute attribute. Possible values are high, medium, and low.

heading: calendar
comment: The calendar used for the dating in the preceding columns, as encoded within the @calendar attribute. The most common value is Gregorian.

heading: occupation
comment: The occupation of the person.

heading: sex
comment: The sex of the person. Values are 'male', 'female', and 'unknown'.

heading: nationality
comment: The nationality of the person.

heading: lang knowledge
comment: The languages known by the person.

heading: residence
comment: The place of residence of the person.

heading: affiliation
comment: The affiliation of the person, if applicable. This column usually contains details of religious orders.

heading: bibl(s)
comment: All bibliographic references associated with this person, as encoded within bibl elements.

heading: note(s)
comment: Notes about the person, as given within a child note element to the org element.
